programme.desc: Ashley takes snorkeling to the extreme when she swims among whale sharks and life-sized art installations in Cancun, before exploring the splendor of Riviera Maya's scenic landscapes.

programme.desc: "1st Look" soaks up tons of culture with a visit to Mexico's Estado de Mexico and the host city for the 2018 Winter Olympic Games PyeongChang, South Korea.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Ashley shares the spotlight with furry friends, including llamas, pigs, horses and dogs.
